articles.author: The Race Team
articles.title: F1 British GP starting grid after stewards' rulings - The Race
articles.description: Mercedes Formula 1 drivers George Russell and Lewis Hamilton will start the 2024 British Grand Prix from the front row of the grid, after beating McLaren and Red Bull to qualify 1-2 at Silverstone
articles.content:
Mercedes Formula 1 drivers George Russell and Lewis Hamilton will start the 2024 British Grand Prix from the front row of the grid, after beating McLaren and Red Bull to qualify 1-2 at Silverstone.
